value:
$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Lady Nerþuz!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Please return the Ár!$k$p$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face|My, my... To think you children made
it all the way here on your own. You
are as strong as you are precious!$k$p$EFace_Normal2|Though... I told you to leave this
place, did I not? Yet you chose to
follow me... Such naughty children.$k$p$EFace_Anger|There is only one thing to be done
with naughty children: punish them.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|W-wait!$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Anger|On your guard, children of Midgard!$k$pHer power rivals that of King Njörðr...$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|We...defeated a goddess?$k$p$SbpBGM_MNS_FE10_01,0|$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face|Heehee! Such precious little things!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|What?!$k$p

$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face|Forgive me... This is unfair of me.
You have no chance of defeating me
with that mortal strength of yours.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Oh no...$k$p$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face|Even so...I could not bring myself
to defeat you either. You are simply
too precious! Heehee!$k$p$EFace_Pain2|*sigh* I suppose I have no choice.
If you want it so badly, I will allow
you to take the Ár with you.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Lady Nerþuz... Thank you so much!$k$p$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face|Now, now... This is a special treat.
I'm giving this to you only because
you're all such darling little things.$k$pIn fact, I must say you are just as
sweet as when we last met, Sharena.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Huh? ...I mean, thank you!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|You've...met Sharena before?$k$p$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face|Of course! And you as well, Alfonse.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Y-you have? I'm sorry, but I must
admit that I have no memory of
ever meeting you.$k$p$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face_Cool2|Of course not! As is to be expected.
This is the first time any of you have
met me, after all!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I'm...confused.$k$p$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face_Normal2|We will meet again...someday.$k$pAnd that meeting was the first time
I met you—or will be the first time,
as you see it.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|I'm having trouble understanding.
What do you mean by—$k$p$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face_Smile|Of course you are! I'm sure it is all
quite strange to your mind. But that
is the way of things.$k$pOh, yes! That's right... I have a special
message for you, Sharena.$k$p$EFace|When next we meet, should you find
something troubling you, remember
these words...$k$p$EFace_Cool|Make your request sweetly, as sweet
as one of my beloved creatures of
the land might.$k$pDo so, and I think you will find me
more easily swayed.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|I should ask you...like an animal?$k$p$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face|Heehee! You need not understand
for the time being—but do remember!$k$pNow, it is nearly time for me to retire.
Even goddesses need their rest! I will
see you darlings again...someday.$k$p$Sbs150|
